name: Grid

props.name: adaptive
props.description: Switch to a single column when the surface is in portrait.

props.name: compact
props.description: Zero out both pad and gap for a tight layout.

props.name: gap
props.description: Space between cells. Numbers map via theme.spacing(n); strings pass through.

props.name: pad
props.description: Inner padding for the grid container. Same mapping as gap.

props.name: preset
props.description: Apply style presets via definePreset/preset registry.

bestPractices: Use `Grid` for two‑axis alignment. Prefer `Stack` for linear flows where only one axis matters.
Keep tracks simple: equal‑width `columns` are fast and readable; let children span using `` .
Share spacing with the system. Use numeric `gap` / `pad` so density matches other primitives.
Use `adaptive` to collapse to a single column on portrait/narrow screens instead of ad‑hoc media queries.
Maintain logical DOM order for keyboard and screen readers; don’t rely on grid placement to imply reading order.
